column1: 1709,Fantastic Four (1998) #524,524,46602,39,"This is it! The Waid/Wieringo team go out with a bang --but they have one last surprise up their sleeves as the foundation of the team is rocked one final time.  If you're hungry for one last jaw-dropping plot twist, here it is--and it's a doozy!,2005,3
